SELECT * FROM Board_TB WHERE see = 'Y' AND (MTtime > NOW() OR MTtime is null) AND
(title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
${option} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

SELECT * FROM Board_TB WHERE (see = 'Y' OR see = 'N') AND listType = 'Notice' ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};

SELECT * FROM Board_TB WHERE (see = 'Y' OR see = 'N') AND listType = 'Notice' AND
(title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
${option} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

mapper.update: UPDATE Board_TB SET title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, MTtime=#{MTtime, jdbcType=DATE}, UPtime=NOW() WHERE seq = #{seq} LIMIT 1;
